scripts.test:parallel: concurrently "npx cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/workforce/addworker.cy.js" "npx cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/workforce/filter.cy.js" "npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/workforce/column.cy.js,cypress/e2e/workforce/search.cy.js,cypress/e2e/workforce/fileUpload&Download.cy.js'"
scripts.cypress:report: npx cypress run && npx allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && npx surge ./allure-report https://kwant-ui-automation-dashboard.surge.sh
